    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(Symbol symbol)
        The method checks whether the value of the symbol is already on the HashMap.
        If so, the position (line number) is not updated as we only want to know where the token has been encountered for the first time.
        Parameters:
        symbol - which must be add to the table

        public java.lang.String toString()
